Title: We must keep a firm grasp on the cloth
Designer: Shanghai National Cotton Factory No. Eight (上海國棉八厂供稿)
Publisher: Shanghai renmin chubanshe (上海人民出版社)
Notes: Shanghai National Cotton Factory No. Eight (上海國棉八厂供稿) was a very large and famous mill. It has been converted into a cultural venue, the Peninsula 1919 Cultural and Creative Industry Park ( 半岛1919文创产业园), in the 2010s.The slogan on the wall reads "Keep the motherland in mind and look at the world!" (胸怀祖国放眼世界！). The slogan on the pillar reads "Grasp revolution and promote production" (抓革命促生产).
